blog:item.title: Added 'Contact Me' page
blog:item.blog:content: Added a "Contact Me" page containing things like address, telephone number (both normal and mobile), E-Mail and on top of that a panel that connects you directly to me when I'm on-line with ICQ. You can check my on-line status easily by looking at the flower image in the left-hand frame next to the "Contact Me" menu item: if it's green I'm on-line and by clicking on it you'll be transported directly to the ICQ Web Panel. I also added a form where you should have been able to write me a message that would be sent to my mobile phone, but my luck has it that the site that provided that service has locked out external sites from posting data because of several cases of abuse of their (free!) service . You could of course still go to their site and enter things manually, my mobile phone number is mentioned on the "Contact Me" page as well.
